sentences.en: A nagging oversupply of houses and record - low - builder confidence suggest new - home sales won't perk up soon, either.
sentences.cn: 房屋始终供大于求和房屋建筑商信心处于历史 低位,表明新屋销售也不会很快复苏.

sentences.en: As indicated before, there is an oversupply of food on the island.
sentences.cn: 前面说过, 岛上的粮食本来是自给有余的.

sentences.en: At present, the total production of the serious oversupply of steel, especially sheet metal issues.
sentences.cn: 目前, 我国钢铁生产总量严重过剩, 板材问题尤为突出.

sentences.en: Carbs are converted to energy as needed, but stored as fat when there is an oversupply!
sentences.cn: 碳水化合物转化为能源的需要, 但由于储存脂肪的时候,仍是供过于求!

sentences.en: Fortnight under review arrival steady market oversupply price improvement unseen.
sentences.cn: 据查由于两周来市场上货太多,导致供过于求,看不出价格有提高迹象.

sentences.en: From new capacity, eliminating the backward side, within three years will not be an oversupply situation.
sentences.cn: 而从新增产能 、 淘汰落后方面看, 三年内不会出现供过于求局面.

sentences.en: Is there a shortfall or oversupply?
sentences.cn: 是否有供应不足或者供给过多？

sentences.en: It could also avoid oversupply and the consequent economic problems.
sentences.cn: 这也能避免供应过剩和由此引起的经济问题.

sentences.en: Natural gas is expected oversupply in medium term.
sentences.cn: 天然气预计在中期内供过于求.

sentences.en: OPEC's members have been trying to limit production to ease oversupply.
sentences.cn: 欧佩克成员国一直试图限制产量以缓解供应过剩。

sentences.en: Second, there is an oversupply of graduates in certain specialties.
sentences.cn: 其次, 在特定的专门中有毕业生的供给过多.

sentences.en: The market softened because of oversupply.
sentences.cn: 市场因供过于求而疲软.

sentences.en: The oversupply of grain led to lower prices so that the revenue Food and Agriculture standards.
sentences.cn: 供大于求导致粮食价格下降,从而使粮农收入水平下降.

sentences.en: To my knowledge, there is an oversupply of such goods.
sentences.cn: 据我所知, 这种商品现在供过于求.

sentences.en: Underperformance also leads to an oversupply of goods and services, putting more downward pressure on prices.
sentences.cn: 表现不佳还导致产品和服务供过于求, 给价格带来更大的下行压力.

sentences.en: Using more natural gas, in oversupply and cheap relative to oil, is an obvious choice.
sentences.cn: 更多地使用天然气是显而易见的选择, 因为天然气比石油供应量大且更便宜.

sentences.en: We have a shortage of skilled technicians but an oversupply of unskilled workers.
sentences.cn: 我们缺少技术人员,却有过量没技能的工人.

sentences.en: Worse, the extreme growth of investment during the financial crisis has added to the problem of oversupply.
sentences.cn: 更糟的是，在金融危机期间，极端的投资增长进一步加剧了供过于求的问题。

words.tran_cn: 垫得又软又厚的；冗长的；多油的
装填过度；涂油过多（overstuff的过去分词）
使过度紧张；使工作过度；伸张过度
过分强调；过分拉紧（或紧张）
装填过度；给（软椅、沙发等）加厚软垫

trans.tran_en: the state of having more of something than you need or can sell
to supply too much (material, etc) or too many (goods, people, etc)
